review: Very unhappy with this product.  Connects to the wifi, connects to the network, connects to internet, starts downloading the update and once it gets to 100% downloaded it then informs you that it cannot connect to roku.  Tried to contact roku for support and the only support available is a FAQ page, no answer on my question, or chat with a 25 minute wait time.Do Not Recommend, no real support for people with a busy life.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Bought this for my wife for Christmas. We recently ditched DirecTV and installed an over-the-air TV antenna. The Roku is simple to use and works well with our streaming services: Amazon Prime, Hulu Plus and Netflix. Also with You Tube and Pandora. Simple to set up and my wife is discovering new programming all the time. Much easier than using the apps build in to the TV or Blu-ray player.
author: T. Richardson
